name: Delara Kazakova
aboutMeInfo: I am a very creative person. I have always had a passion for creating beautiful things, and I wanted to incorporate that into my work. Taking into account my interest in technology, I made the decision to challenge myself and become a web developer.
possition1Info: This is where my passion for computer technology was born. I had the opportunity to work as a system administrator, serving file and email servers, as well as managing computer equipment throughout the company.
possition2Info: Mainly, my responsibilities included the implementation and maintenance of the geographic information system's database.
bachelorInfo: This is where my programming journey began. I studied the R language for the purposes of marketing research.
project1: A website design created using Bootstrap.
project2: This is an EJS and MongoDB project.
project3: This is a React app that can keep your notes.
project4: Another website design created using Bootstrap
project5: Currently working on the design on this website for a catering company.
